name: Enlighter
description:
Enlighter is a 2D puzzle-tactical game. It features a single player campaign, a skirmish mode and some cool local PVP. Release date to be determined, lots of things should change until then - especially in the graphics area. This is an early demo of this game.

The current level is completed when all the bulbs on screen are switched on, including the one in your ship.

The twist is that you must always stay connected. Each level usually starts with an electric generator ; spawn your own ‘electromagnetic’ relays for they could act as connecting spots, linking the bulbs through the hostile environment. A relay may have different weapon configurations to choose from.

You’ll have to adapt while crossing the path of enemies evolutive AI, alien artefacts and entities, fauna with different behaviors ; environment itself has its own mechanics.

Eventually, It opens possibilities of intricate puzzles and fine tactical battles !

This demo comes with a very short survey. It launches on your favorite navigator when exiting the program. Please allow this window and help me enhance this project !
